pages.about: About Us - PraeceptorVirtus About Services News FAQ Members Reviews Contact us Home About Services News FAQ Members Reviews Contact us About us Discover PraeceptorVirtus At PraeceptorVirtus, we are dedicated to providing top-notch online tutoring services tailored to meet the diverse needs of our students. Founded on the principles of excellence and innovation, we connect learners with highly qualified educators from around the world. Our platform is designed to make learning accessible, engaging, and effective, leveraging cutting-edge technology and personalized approaches. Our vision at PraeceptorVirtus is to revolutionize education by making high-quality, personalized learning experiences accessible to everyone, everywhere. We aim to be the leading online tutoring platform that empowers students to achieve their full potential through innovative teaching methods and dedicated support. We envision a world where education transcends geographical boundaries and every learner has the tools and resources they need to succeed. Our Members John Smith Math Tutor Specializes in algebra and calculus with a passion for helping students understand complex concepts. contact New York, USA 10 years Mon, Wed, Fri Emily Johnson Science Tutor Experienced in teaching physics and chemistry with innovative and interactive methods. contact London, UK 8 years Tue, Thu, Sat Michael Brown English Tutor Focuses on literature and writing skills, with a commitment to improving students' reading comprehension. contact Sydney, Australia 12 years Mon, Tue, Thu, Fri Our Features 1 Personalized Learning Tailored tutoring sessions to fit each student's unique needs. 2 Expert Tutors Access to a diverse team of highly qualified and experienced educators. 3 Flexible Scheduling Convenient and adaptable scheduling options to fit your busy lifestyle. 4 Interactive Lessons Engaging and interactive sessions designed to make learning enjoyable. 5 Progress Tracking Regular assessments and feedback to track and support your learning progress. 6 24/7 Access Access to resources and support anytime, anywhere, for continuous learning. Our Testimonial Alice Johnson - High School Teacher "PraeceptorVirtus has been a game-changer for my students. The personalized approach and expert tutors have made a significant difference in their academic performance. Highly recommended!" Michael Brown - Software Engineer "The flexibility and quality of the tutoring services are exceptional. I've seen great improvement in my skills and understanding, thanks to the dedicated tutors at PraeceptorVirtus." Patna, Bihar, India praeceptorvirtus@gmail.com +914797423346 Privacy Policy Home About Services News FAQ Members Reviews Contact us

Stay tuned for more details! 15.07.2024 1200 Meet Our New Tutors We are excited to introduce our new team of expert tutors. Each brings a wealth of experience and a passion for teaching. Learn more about their backgrounds and areas of expertise on our website. 10.07.2024 950 How to Maximize Your Learning Experience Discover tips and strategies to make the most out of your online tutoring sessions. From setting goals to effective study habits, we share insights to help you succeed. 01.07.2024 860 Why choose us Expert Tutors Our team consists of highly qualified tutors with years of experience in their respective fields. Flexible Scheduling We offer flexible scheduling options to accommodate your busy lifestyle, ensuring you get the support you need when you need it. Personalized Approach Our personalized tutoring sessions are tailored to meet your individual learning needs and goals. Get in Touch We're Here to Help Whether you have questions about our services, need assistance, or want to provide feedback, we're always here to listen. Our team is dedicated to providing you with the support you need to achieve your learning goals. Feel free to reach out to us at any time! Contact now FAQ How can I book a tutoring session? You can book a tutoring session through our website by selecting your preferred subject and tutor. Once you've chosen, you can schedule a session at a time that suits you best. What are the qualifications of your tutors? Our tutors are highly qualified professionals with extensive experience in their respective fields. Each tutor holds advanced degrees and has a proven track record of helping students succeed. How do I cancel or reschedule a session? To cancel or reschedule a session, please log in to your account on our website and navigate to the "My Sessions" section. From there, you can manage your bookings according to our cancellation policy. Is there a minimum commitment required? There is no minimum commitment required. You can book sessions as needed based on your academic needs and availability. How do I pay for the tutoring sessions? Payments for tutoring sessions can be made through our secure online payment system. We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards and online payment platforms. What if I am not satisfied with a session? If you are not satisfied with a session, please contact our support team within 24 hours. We offer a satisfaction guarantee and will work with you to address any issues or provide a refund if necessary. Can I choose my tutor? Yes, you can choose your tutor based on their profiles, qualifications, and reviews. We recommend reviewing the tutor profiles to find the best match for your needs. What technology do I need for online tutoring? To participate in online tutoring sessions, you will need a computer or tablet with a stable internet connection, a webcam, and a microphone. We use a user-friendly video conferencing platform to conduct sessions. Contact us We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, need support, or just want to give us feedback, our team is here to assist you. Enter I accept Privacy policy Patna, Bihar, India praeceptorvirtus@gmail.com +914797423346 Privacy Policy Home About Services News FAQ Members Reviews Contact us
pages.policy: Privacy Policy - PraeceptorVirtus About Services News FAQ Members Reviews Contact us Home About Services News FAQ Members Reviews Contact us Privacy policy Information We Collect We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services. This includes personal information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and phone number, as well as usage data collected automatically. We also gather information about your interactions with our website, such as your IP address, browser type, and browsing behavior. This helps us understand how our services are used and how we can enhance your experience. How We Use Your Information We use your personal information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and process transactions. This includes sending you updates, newsletters, and promotional materials relevant to your interests. Your information may also be used for administrative purposes, such as managing your account and resolving any issues or disputes. We do not use your information for purposes other than those described in this policy without your consent. Data Sharing and Disclosure We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this policy. We may disclose your information to service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing services, but only to the extent necessary to perform their functions. We may also disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users or others. We ensure that any third parties we share data with adhere to similar privacy standards. Data Security We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include encryption, access controls, and regular security assessments. Despite our efforts to protect your data, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security, but we strive to maintain the highest standards of security. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information that we hold. You can update your information through your account settings or by contacting us directly. You may also request to restrict or object to the processing of your personal information. We will consider your request and respond in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party sites that are not operated by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information. If you navigate to a third-party site from our website, any information you provide on that site is governed by its own privacy policy. We do not endorse or assume any responsibility for the practices of these third parties. Childrenâ€™s Privacy Our services are not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we can take appropriate action to protect their privacy. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. If we make significant changes to the policy, we may notify you through email or other communication channels. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at praeceptorvirtus@gmail.com. We will respond to your inquiries in a timely manner and address any issues you may have regarding the handling of your personal information. Data Retention We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. The retention period may vary based on the type of information and its use. After the retention period has expired, we will securely delete or anonymize your personal information to prevent unauthorized access or use. International Transfers Your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. These countries may have different data protection laws than your country. We take appropriate measures to ensure that your information is protected when transferred internationally, including implementing standard contractual clauses or other safeguards required by applicable laws. Automated Decision-Making We may use automated decision-making processes to provide you with personalized experiences and services. This includes using algorithms to analyze your data and make recommendations or decisions based on your preferences and behavior. You have the right to request human intervention or contest decisions made solely by automated processes. If you have concerns, please contact us to discuss your options. User Choices You have the ability to control certain aspects of your personal information. This includes updating your profile information, adjusting communication preferences, and opting out of marketing communications. To exercise these choices, please access your account settings or contact us for assistance. We will assist you in managing your preferences and ensuring your data is handled according to your wishes. Links to Other Websites Our website may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit. The inclusion of a link to another website does not imply endorsement or responsibility for the content or practices of that site. We are not liable for any issues that arise from your use of such sites. Legal Compliance We comply with applicable data protection laws and regulations in the jurisdictions where we operate. This includes adhering to requirements related to data collection, processing, storage, and transfer. We may also cooperate with regulatory authorities to ensure compliance with legal obligations and address any concerns related to data protection and privacy. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. If we make significant changes to the policy, we may notify you through email or other communication channels. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at praeceptorvirtus@gmail.com. We will respond to your inquiries in a timely manner and address any issues you may have regarding the handling of your personal information. Data Retention We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. The retention period may vary based on the type of information and its use. After the retention period has expired, we will securely delete or anonymize your personal information to prevent unauthorized access or use. International Transfers Your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. These countries may have different data protection laws than your country. We take appropriate measures to ensure that your information is protected when transferred internationally, including implementing standard contractual clauses or other safeguards required by applicable laws. Automated Decision-Making We may use automated decision-making processes to provide you with personalized experiences and services. This includes using algorithms to analyze your data and make recommendations or decisions based on your preferences and behavior. You have the right to request human intervention or contest decisions made solely by automated processes. If you have concerns, please contact us to discuss your options. User Choices You have the ability to control certain aspects of your personal information. This includes updating your profile information, adjusting communication preferences, and opting out of marketing communications. To exercise these choices, please access your account settings or contact us for assistance. We will assist you in managing your preferences and ensuring your data is handled according to your wishes. Links to Other Websites Our website may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit. The inclusion of a link to another website does not imply endorsement or responsibility for the content or practices of that site. We are not liable for any issues that arise from your use of such sites. Legal Compliance We comply with applicable data protection laws and regulations in the jurisdictions where we operate. This includes adhering to requirements related to data collection, processing, storage, and transfer. We may also cooperate with regulatory authorities to ensure compliance with legal obligations and address any concerns related to data protection and privacy. Your Privacy Choices You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. Additionally, you can choose to limit the amount of data we collect and how we use it. For detailed information on managing your privacy choices, please refer to our user settings or contact us directly. To exercise your rights, please follow the instructions provided in our user interface or reach out to our support team for further assistance. We are committed to respecting your privacy and ensuring that your preferences are honored. Data Protection Officer We have appointed a Data Protection Officer (DPO) to oversee our data protection activities and ensure compliance with applicable laws. The DPO is responsible for handling data protection inquiries and addressing any concerns related to your personal information. You can contact our DPO at praeceptorvirtus@gmail.com for any issues related to data protection or privacy. Our DPO will assist you with any questions or concerns you may have. Employee Access Access to personal information within our organization is restricted to authorized employees who require it to perform their job duties. We have implemented policies and procedures to ensure that only those with a legitimate need have access to sensitive data. Employees are trained on data protection and privacy best practices to ensure compliance with our policies and applicable laws. We also conduct regular audits to verify that access controls and security measures are being properly followed. Data Breach Notification In the event of a data breach that affects your personal information, we will notify you as required by law. We will provide details about the breach, including the nature of the data affected, the steps we are taking to address it, and any actions you should take to protect yourself. We will also notify relevant regulatory authorities if the breach poses a significant risk to your rights and freedoms. Our priority is to mitigate any potential harm and ensure transparency throughout the process. User Consent By using our services, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy. Your consent is required for us to process your data in accordance with this policy. You may withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us. However, please note that withdrawal of consent may affect your ability to use certain features of our services. Policy Scope This Privacy Policy applies to all personal information collected by us through our website and services. It does not apply to information collected through third-party sites or services linked to our website. If you have questions about the scope of this policy or its applicability, please contact us for clarification. We are committed to ensuring that our privacy practices are clear and transparent. Employee Training We provide regular training to our employees on data protection and privacy practices. This training covers the importance of safeguarding personal information, recognizing potential security threats, and adhering to our privacy policies. Ongoing education ensures that our staff remains informed about current data protection regulations and best practices. This helps us maintain a high standard of privacy and security across our operations. Contact us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us at praeceptorvirtus@gmail.com. We are committed to addressing your inquiries promptly and transparently.
